definition: to convert into/to amount to/to be equivalent to
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The direct calculation method of precision conversion of long range antiship missile is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了远程反舰导弹精度折合的直接推算方法。

sentences.english: Its original cost is estimated to have been about 100 pounds in today's prices.
sentences.chinese: 这个饼干盒的原价折合到今天卖预估是100英镑。

sentences.english: According to the present rate, 100 US dollars is equal to 683 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 根据现在的牌价，每100美元折合人民币683元。

sentences.english: To reduce pounds to pence you multiply by a hundred.
sentences.chinese: 镑乘以一百就折合成便士。

sentences.english: A fast and convenient method for the determination of trace residues of organophosphorus and(carbamate) pesticides in pond water was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 测定池塘水中有机磷和氨基甲酸酯农药残留折合总量。

sentences.english: Darts must be folded out and cut.
My first guitar cost me ￥90.00 equel to $10.00.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一把吉他值90人民币，折合10美元左右。

sentences.english: Energy types are converted into SCE calculated in terms of equal value.
sentences.chinese: 能源品种均已折合为按等价值计算的吨标准煤。

sentences.english: This wool costs twenty yuan a Jin.
It also presents the practical packaging method for the transport with folded converting case which possesses much economical and social effects.
sentences.chinese: 提出了适合我国国情的可折合式运输周转箱包装方法。
